segment.source: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console

segment.source: You can use the Application Virtualization Client Management Console to manage virtual applications in the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) cache.
segment.target: You can use the Application Virtualization Client Management Console to manage virtual applications in the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) cache.

segment.source: In the context of application virtualization, the cache is the area on the client computer reserved to store virtual applications.
segment.target: In the context of application virtualization, the cache is the area on the client computer reserved to store virtual applications.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: How to Load or Unload an Application
segment.target: How to Load or Unload an Application

segment.source: Provides procedures for loading or unloading an application into or from the client cache.
segment.target: Provides procedures for loading or unloading an application into or from the client cache.

segment.source: How to Clear an Application
segment.target: How to Clear an Application

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to clear the settings, file type associations, and shortcuts from the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to clear the settings, file type associations, and shortcuts from the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services.

segment.source: How to Repair an Application
segment.target: How to Repair an Application

segment.source: Provides a procedure for repairing an application from the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for repairing an application from the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services.

segment.source: How to Import an Application
segment.target: How to Import an Application

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to add a new application to the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to add a new application to the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services.

segment.source: How to Lock or Unlock an Application
segment.target: How to Lock or Unlock an Application

segment.source: Provides procedures for locking or unlocking an application in the cache.
segment.target: Provides procedures for locking or unlocking an application in the cache.

segment.source: How to Delete an Application
segment.target: How to Delete an Application

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to remove an application from the file system cache.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to remove an application from the file system cache.

segment.source: How to Change an Application Icon
segment.target: How to Change an Application Icon

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to change the icon associated with the selected application.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to change the icon associated with the selected application.
